name: My Innermost Criminal
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/my-inner-criminal
Rob a bank as a Matriyoshka Doll!

You're a clever criminal, but you can't do it alone, reach deeper within yourself to find the help you need.

Hold T to turn back time.

Press S to split.

HIGHLY recommended that you play the ZIP instead of the browser version, no extraction needed!
